title: Sorting Algorithms (Overview)
subject: Data Structures
theory:
Sorting arranges data in order. 
- **Stable**: Preserves order of equal elements.
- **In-Place**: O(1) extra space.
- **Adaptive**: Faster if already sorted.

interview_questions.question: Lower bound of comparison sort?
interview_questions.answer: O(n log n). You cannot beat this mathematically with comparisons.
